Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your life. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to take advantage of this exclusive offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
